sourcesContent:
<script setup>
import { useStore } from '@/stores/mainStore';
import { productsStore } from '@/stores/productsStore';
import {ref} from 'vue'

const store = useStore()
const productStore = productsStore()

let text = ref('')
async function searchProduct() {
    const res = await fetch(`http://10.10.1.74:80/api/v1/catalog/search/categories-product?search=${text}`, {
        headers: store.headers
    })
    const data = await res.json();
    productStore.products.value = await data;
}
</script>
<template>
<input type="text" placeholder="Введите или выберите товар..." v-model="text" @>
</template>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
input {
    width: 100%;
    height: 60px;
    margin-bottom: 50px;
    background-color: white;
    padding: 20px;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1px solid #F0F0F0;
    font-size: medium;
    font-weight: 400;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 30px rgba(2, 154, 173, 0.15);
}
input:focus {
    outline: none;
}
</style>
